You are of average height, and while your muscles aren't all that big, you do possess a decent amount of strength. You have medium length black hair and do not have any facial hair to speak of. * * *

You nervously looked around at your surroundings as you glanced back and forth through the crowd of people who were patiently waiting in line to enter the BBC club. A lot of them were incredibly attractive, and it was actually making you feel a bit out of place. Earlier you had tried to find a different entrance to the BBC, but you ultimately found that the main entrance was really the only way to go, as all of the other ways inside were only used for evacuation, and even if you had managed to find a way to bypass that someone would certainly see you enter through one of these doors. It was only a matter of time til they then threw you out. You sighed as you turned around to stare back at the start of the line which had only grown since you got there. A small smile formed on your face as you were glad you didn't show up late.

As you continued to stare at the back of the line you heard a soft voice that was unmistakably from a woman. "Uh, excuse me, the line is moving again."

You turned your head to the source of the voice and saw an attractive brunette woman around your age wearing a dark blue t-shirt and a short plaid skirt that had the hem just above her knees. She was carrying a small brown purse over her shoulder and also had some black flats on her feet. Overall she looked really nice, though the clothing seemed a bit odd considering that most of the other people with her level of attractiveness were wearing much skimpier outfits. Perhaps she had scars or something? Still, you were surprised you didn't notice her earlier as she was right behind you the whole time, but you ultimately shrugged it off. It was then that you realized you were still staring at the woman, and so you hastily replied back to her. "Oh, uh, my bad."

At this the woman seemed to giggle and smile at you a bit, and you returned a faint smile back as you walked forward towards the entrance. Honestly you had felt out of place before, but after seeing someone who was both attractive and actually dressed like a normal person, well that made you feel a little less insecure.

A few moments later and you had finally reached the entrance of the BBC. This is the part where things would be tough.

As you slowly climbed the stairs to the doorway you tried to slip past the guards but one of them saw you and pulled you aside. "You seem rather out of place with that get-up, just who are you?"

You weren't exactly prepared for this, and spouted the first thing that came to mind. "I'm the archduke Vermillion Stranz." As you said this you mentally wanted to kick yourself for saying something so unbelievable.

The guard looked over at you curiously before finally grabbing you forcefully and pulling you inside the door. While you knew you could probably take him in a fight, there were a ton of people around, and violence wouldn't solve anything at this point. You'd just need to be compliant and see how this plays out.

Entering the main room of the BBC you could see a whole manner of people, all of them wildly dancing in tune to the loud music as they raved along to the beat and flaunted their bodies. The smell of sex and sweat permeated your nostrils and the whole place seemed especially strange to you. The guard however ignored the crowd and pushed his way through a door and into a hallway. "Really?!?" You asked ecstatic.

"Yes, you're free to stay here. You have a good enough body that you could probably bet your way up and make some cash. If you do well enough out there, maybe I'll even let you challenge me." She said as she happily smiled at you.

Pumping your fist in the air you headed out towards the door, only to realize you didn't even know how to get back to the main gambling lounge.

"Ah hold on a minute." Said Claire as she quickly pulled out a walkie talkie and called for some assistance.

It wasn't long before a man dressed as a butler came into the room. "Yes my lady, did you need something? Do you need me to remove this man from here?"

Claire waved her hand dismissively. "No, nothing like that, well actually in a way I suppose it's true. I need you to escort this man back to the main lounge."

The servant bowed before he opened the door for you to step through. Just as you were about to leave though, you heard Claire's voice from behind you. "There is a catch to this arrangement Jeff."

"Huh? And what's that?" You asked as you turned around.

Claire poured herself another cup of tea and ignored you as she took another sip. It was obvious she wouldn't let you in on whatever secret plan she had in store for you. Still, you felt pretty confident as you were now inside the BBC. All you had to do was win a couple of gambles and make enough cash to get out of here.

A few minutes of walking later and you were finally just a few steps away from the door to the main lounge. Strangely enough however, the pounding music from earlier seemed to be absent. Hesitantly you opened the door to see everyone inside focused solely on you.

"It's a rat!" "A rat!" "How did a rat get inside?" "Why would they let a rat in?" The people inside the lounge began to mutter incessantly about you causing you to grow increasingly more uncomfortable.

"Don't worry, none of them will harm you as you're a guest." Said the servant, though that really didn't ease your mind very much. You looked forward at the sea of faces and ultimately decided to...
15511.title: A peculiar meeting

choices: "I wish you the best of luck with whatever happens to you."
"Allow me to try and help you win your body back."
155112.content:
With the crowd solely focused on you, you felt as though challenging someone right now would be suicidal. "Get out of here you filthy rat!" Yelled a man from the crowd as an open plastic bottle of water was thrown at you. You were about to dodge the bottle when the servant beside you surprisingly stepped in front of the flying object and blocked it with his body, his clothes becoming soaked with water in the process. The servant didn't even flinch as the water dripped down his pant leg and instead just adjusted his glasses as if it were a mere annoyance.

"Oh shit!" Said someone from the background, and you likely figured that it was whoever threw the water, though of course you didn't quite know who that was.

"Listen up everyone! This is our esteemed guest, and any intolerance towards him will be treated as if you are intolerant towards Lady Claire herself. Do I make myself clear, or would you prefer me to notify Lady Claire about this and interrupt her relaxation time?" Said the servant as he spoke loudly and clearly, smirking slightly all the while. From the look on the servants face, he seemed rather serious, though a part of you felt like he was acting this way if only because he could now freely yell at the members of the B.B.C.

While it was a nice looking place on the outside, the environment and personality of the various bettors leaved a lot to be desired, and it wasn't hard to imagine that some of the servants may be abused in some way. The servants actions could merely be a way for him to vent out his true thoughts and feelings, something you doubted he got much of a chance to do, if ever.

Regardless of this thought, you still felt the need to go to the bathroom, as you didn't want to jump into any gambles just yet, at least not with everyone's eyes watching you. That and you actually did sort of need to use the restroom. Leaning over to the servant you began to ask "Where exactly is the bathroom located?"

The servant took a brief glance at you before turning away and pointing towards a door at the far end of the room, opposite from where you were standing. "Go into that hallway, and it should be the third door on the left."

"Thank you very much." you replied which caused the servant to smile. "Don't mention it." He said as he began to walk off to who knows where.

Making your way to the restroom you pushed your way through the crowd as a deathly silence filled the room. A little over half-way there, you could start to here a few mumbling voices, though you couldn't make out much of anything other than the word 'rat' getting thrown around a lot. As you continued to make your way down to the doorway, a large man wearing nothing but a pair of shorts and a pair of sandals bumped into your shoulder hard. "Watch where you're going rat."

You paused for a second, gripping your shoulder before moving on as you ignored the man. This seemed to only egg on a few more members as a pretty woman wearing nothing but lingerie moved in your path and scoffed. "I don't know what the hell Claire is thinking by letting you in. Consider yourself lucky you weren't forcibly stripped of your parts to the highest bidder." Said the woman as you sensed a bit of anger and disgust in her voice.

"Heh, poor guy won't even last 10 seconds in a gamble. Why don't you just give me your parts right now and I'll give you 1% of the profits. A couple of dollars should more than double your worth right?" Said another man who then began to laugh at his own joke.

"Why would you want the parts of a rat?" Spoke another woman. "I'm pretty sure none of the rejected would even bid on parts of such low quality like his. They're probably better off as they are now."

By now you were starting to feel extremely agitated, of course you knew you couldn't cause a scene. Even if you did you wouldn't be able to do much of anything, and you didn't really want to get kicked out of this place so soon when you didn't even make any money to relieve yourself of your debt. Finally you reached the door, and after hastily opening it and stepping inside the hallway you began to look for the bathroom. "Third door on the left." you muttered as you continued forward. A few moments later you had found the restroom, though curiously the bathroom appeared to be mixed. The thought was a bit strange to you, but after thinking about how often people probably trade parts and even genders, it really didn't seem all that strange. You opened the restroom, only to hear the loud music from the main lounge spring back to life as the hypnotic rhythm reverberated in your eardrums. "They'll probably forget about me soon enough" You muttered as you stepped into the restroom and turned the corner of the small path.

What awaited you in that bathroom, shook you to your very core. Inside a ton of people, all of them downcast and reeking of failure and desperation. Most of them were huddled on the ground crying their eyes out, however there were a few others standing by the sink or inside of the stalls. "Dammit! I was so close to winning. If only I played the right card! Now I have nothing!" Yelled a man as he began to sulk on the counter of the sink. Another man was punching the wall in anger over and over again, his fists bloodied and bruised.

"How... how could this happen to me?" Asked the man as he took another swing at the wall.

You quickly bypassed him and made your way to one of the unoccupied stalls. "I'm so ugly! I'm a hideous monster. I need to start all over again!" Said a female, from within a stall as you heard her break down and cry. You walked past the stall and paid her no mind as you continued towards one of the unoccupied stalls to relieve yourself. This place was a pit of despair, and you knew you couldn't stay here for too long or it would suck away all of your confidence, similar to how a black hole swallows everything in it's path.

After finishing your business you exited the stall and made your way over to the sinks to wash your hands as you prepared to get out of this dreadful place once and for all. Listening to the poor tortured souls that inhabited this room any longer would drive you mad. However, just as you were about to leave you noticed someone familiar in the corner of your eye. There standing in the corner near the exit was a young woman wearing a blue t-shirt and a plaid skirt, the same woman who stood behind you in line before you entered this club.

A part of you felt as though there was no need for you to intervene. After all she had lost a gamble of her own accord. Yet, something inside of your stomach was urging you to go and talk to her anyways. You slowly approached the woman and unsure of what to say, said the only thing you could think of. "Are you okay?"

The woman continued to cry, but calmed down a little bit as she turned around to see you. "No, I'm not fine at all, but there's nothing I can do about it. I screwed up. I screwed up horribly." She said as she began to sulk even more.

"What happened exactly?" You asked.

The woman turned around and faced you as tears began to form in her eyes once more before flowing down her face and dropping onto her her shirt. "I had recently come into some money after a family member died and left me some inheritance money. The only problem is that my family has been struggling really hard for the past few years, and recently both of my parents got sick and can't work anymore. I was invited to join this place a few years ago. I vowed never to come here, but now I don't have any choice. I don't want my family to eat meager crumbs, and I need to help pay for their medical bills before I run out of money entirely."

Before the woman could continue any further you gave her a quick hug which caused her to cling to you tightly as she bawled even harder.

"You don't need to say anymore for me to understand. You came here to help your family, and now you've lost a gamble and have to lose some of your body parts."

The woman continued to cry, only to pause for a moment as she meekly said "No, it's worse than that, I lost my entire body. I'm so scared, and I just don't know what to do. What's going to happen to me?"

This news shocked you, and you curiously asked for more information. "Wait, did you lose a string of bets then?"

The woman shook her head at your question. "No, I stupidly bet my entire body all at once."

"No way? You really did that?" You asked. The woman didn't respond, but from the way she was averting her gaze you could tell she wasn't lying.

The woman let go of you as she pulled out a tissue from her purse to wipe her eyes. 'I should get going now. I was only given a couple of minutes to say goodbye to this body. Thanks for the hug stranger, I really needed that." She quickly wiped away another tear before turning around to head back into the main lounge of the B.B.C.

You knew this was none of your business, and yet you felt really bad for this girl, so much so that you wanted to help her get her body back. However a part of you also realized that this was a bad decision. Helping her might be morally right, but morals don't help you win a game of gambling. You had seen this first hand from working in the casino where many nice men and women had fallen to their knees in poverty by staking everything they had on resolving some sob story. You wouldn't be like them. You would rise the ranks and win with wit and skill. You had no time to help the downtrodden. And yet, despite these feelings, you still felt conflicted.

"Hey!" You called out as you ran out of the restroom. "Hey!" You repeated once more, before the woman finally turned around.

"Yes?" She asked.

You responded with...
155112.title: Bathroom break!

1551122.content:
"Allow me to try and help you win your body back." You said as you took a step forward.

The woman turned around fully and took a step closer to you, clearly in disbelief. "Y...you're going to help me?" She asked, completely bewildered by your statement. "Do you really mean it?" Her eyes were wide and filled with hope, and for a second you were happy that you had decided to help her. Though, you still felt a bit concerned as you didn't even have any money to start over if you did lose your body.

"Yes, I'll help you." You said, rather unenthusiastically. The woman didn’t notice this of course, and instead smiled brightly and ran up to give you a big hug, thanking you profusely all the while. You gave her a hug back, but ultimately didn't want to dally around for too long. "So can you lead me to the one you lost to?" You asked, figuring it was best to get this over with as quick as possible.

The woman let go of her embrace and nodded her head. "Sure thing! By the way, my name’s Sarah." She said before digging into her purse to pull out a tissue to blow her nose.

"Sarah huh? Well it's nice to meet you my name is Jeff." You replied as you flashed a small smile.

"Likewise." Sarah said as she turned around towards a nearby trashcan to throw the tissue away. "Let's head out then." She said as she rubbed her eyes before grabbing your hand and walking towards the door. You weren't quite expecting her to grab your hand, and while you weren't opposed to it, holding hands with a pretty woman was a foreign concept to you. Sarah seemed to pick up on this, as she slowed down a little and turned her head back towards you. "Sorry if this seems a bit strange. I just don't want to lose you in the crowd. After all you’re my only hope Jeff."

"Oh, it's no problem at all." You said as you continued to follow closely behind her before finally making your way to the main lounge door. Opening the door you were once again greeted by the loud rhythm of the music as fellow members of the Body Bettors Club danced to the hypnotic beat. A few of the people there seemed to eye you briefly, but most of them ignored you after a few seconds, seemingly uninterested in anything you had to offer.

"He's right there, the one sitting at the table," said Sarah, as she pointed with her free hand towards an athletic looking man who was busy shuffling a deck of cards. Standing right next to him was a beautiful woman with long wavy black hair wearing French maid attire. While you had been in the club for a bit of time, the woman's attire seemed a bit strange for this area, as you were sure that the normal servants at the B.B.C. were all wearing uniforms that were more akin to that of a fancy waiter or waitress. Was she even a servant in the first place? Maybe this was some sort of perk of being a member of the B.B.C.?

“Oh I see, you’re back Sarah.” The man said as his eyes wandered over Sarah’s body, examining every inch and curve. A few moments passed before the man finally took notice of you, and began to raise his eyebrow. "Oh, and what is this rat doing here? I won your body fair and square Sarah, you can't just back out by giving me someone else's body in exchange. Things don't work that way, though I honestly can't say I'm surprised. You probably promised this rat sex so you could keep your body. Well I'm sorry, but this isn't college, you can't just go around giving people 'favors' to get what you want." The man said, putting a very heavy emphasis on the word favors.

"No you have it wrong, I'm not that kind of girl at all. I would never do something like that. Jeff here just offered to help me himse-"

"Ha, as if I believe that you little slut," interrupted the man as he started to laugh harder and harder at the whole thing.

The way this man was acting was extremely uncalled for, and he was actually starting to piss you off. Moving up towards the table you sat opposite from the man. "Listen jackass, I'm here to win this woman's body back. She didn't promise me anything at all, I'm doing this of my own free will. So cut the crap and put your body parts where your mouth is."

As you said this the man stopped laughing as he stared at you coldly. "Heh, I'm not scared of you at all. Don't think for a second I'll turn your offer down. You could really learn some manners, and without a body to control I’m sure it will be easy enough for you to learn,” said the man as he slowly looked over towards the woman in the maid's costume. “Isn’t that right Naomi?” He asked smugly.

"Yes, master, that is correct," replied the woman as she flashed the man a smile.

"Anyhow, let's play a game shall we?" Said the man as he turned back to you before motioning to a deck of cards resting on the table. "How about a game of blackjack? Is that alright with you?"

"That's fine by me." You said as you scooted your chair up a bit. "Let the games begin!"
1551122.title: "Allow me to try and help you win your body...

choices: Abandon Sarah. This guy seems to tough for you to take on.
You don't want to quit. You want to win and save Sarah
15511222.content:
“Hmph, I’d like to see you try and win.” The man said as he reached for the deck of cards before handing them towards Naomi. “Be a doll and get one of the servants to shuffle the deck for us, will you?”

Grabbing the deck out of the man’s hands Naomi nodded. “Yes master, I’ll do that right away,” and with that Naomi ran off, leaving the man, Sarah, and just you left.

“So then what’s your name boy?” Asked the man.

“Boy huh? Last I checked we’re about the same age. Besides, isn’t it rude anyhow to not introduce yourself first?” You retorted.

“Well I would introduce myself first if you weren’t a piece of vermin gutter trash, but since you asked my name is Steve Hartner. So now that I’ve answered your question, what’s your name, vermin?”

This actually started to anger you a bit, as you slammed your hands down on the table and leaned forward. “The name of the man who will beat you is known as Jeff.” You said, smirking back at the man, though he didn’t seem to care at all. He seemed to not be taking you very seriously. It was then you realized that this man was trying on purpose to rile you up so you wouldn’t be able to think properly. After realizing this you calmed yourself down a little just in time for Naomi to arrive with one of the servants.

“So you all need a dealer then? I’d be happy to assist.” The servant then quickly pulled out a Body Bettors Club Staff ID to show that he was a legitimate dealer.

“We’ll be playing blackjack this time.” Said Steve as he handed the servant the deck of cards. “Now shuffle!”

And with that the servant began to shuffle the cards at a rapid pace. Honestly watching him in the process was unlike anything you had ever seen before. You were pretty good at shuffling cards back at the casino, but this guy was on a whole other level. It was rather impressive actually.

“So then Jeff the rat, what will you be betting today? An arm, a leg, maybe your torso?”

“Actually I’d like to bet the lower half of my body if that’s alright with you.” You replied.

“Oh? Eager to lose are we? Very well, the lower body it is.”

A few more moments passed before the servant then dispatched two cards to both you and Steve, one card face up, while the other card was face down.

You carefully looked over your cards, to find a King of spades, and a face up 8 of hearts. It wasn’t the best hand in the world, but it was fairly decent. Steve on the other hand had a 9, and some other card that was face down. Best to play this safely and just stand. You didn’t want to go bust that early after all.

The servant turned towards you. “Stand or hit?”

“I’ll stand!” You said.

“I stand as well.” Said Steve.

And with that round one was over. You both reached for your face down card and flipped it over to reveal that your final total was 18 while Steve’s was a 19!

Suddenly you felt your legs go limp and lifeless. Try as you might you couldn’t move them at all. “Hey my legs won’t move! What’s going on here?” You asked as you struggled in vain to get them to move.

“Having trouble moving our legs are we? Let’s see if I can help you out. Go ahead and stand vermin!” All of a sudden you popped out of your chair against your own free will. “Oh? It seems like you can move your legs just fine? Maybe you should try walking around a little before we continue though? Really keep that blood flowing.” Still without control your legs began to move, causing you to walk around in small circles before plopping you back down at the table.

“You! You’re doing this aren’t you?” You yelled,

“Took you long enough to figure it out huh? Those legs are mine now, and I can control them all I want. The only way you’ll ever be able to control your legs again is if I let you control them, you win your legs back, or your life is in danger, and ss far as I’m concerned, you should just forfeit now and relinquish your whole body to me.”

Of course you knew this wasn’t a valid choice at all. You had to keep playing or else you wouldn’t be able to pay off your debt.

“Hey Naomi, get me another drink would you? I’m all out of iced tea.” Steve requested.

“Sure thing master,” and with that the cute maid ran off to grab another cup of coffee.

“So then vermin, what exactly will you be wagering against me this time? An arm? Your head? Your-”

“I’d like to wager my whole upper body for my lower body.”

“So you’re risking everything on some final shot huh? You must either be very eager to lose that body, or you’re very stupid. Of course it really doesn’t matter in the end. You were destined to lose your body in this club. If not to me, then to someone else.”

“Well I’m certainly not going to lose to you. Come on, let’s play another match shall we?”

“So be it. Shuffle the cards again and deal the cards.”

The servant picked up the cards and shuffled the deck once more before dealing the cards to both of you. As luck would have it, you managed to get lucky and get a perfect 21 with just two cards. Steve on the other hand ended up with an 18 and ended up losing the match.

“Yes, I won!” You proclaimed victoriously, as you realized you could now move your legs again.

Steve on the other hand didn’t seem very concerned with your win, and instead had a smug look on his face, as if he was still in control. “You just got lucky. You should quit now while you're ahead."
15511222.title: Bet half of your body

1553.content: pick a role you see fit.
1553.title: Ok fine

info.brief_description: In the far future, the world's elite gamble their body parts for status and competition.
info.description:
! GIFT POINTS FOR ADDITIONS !

-----------------------------
Table of Contents
-----------------------------
Summary
Setting
Hierarchy and Universe Rules
Rules
Characters

---------------
Summary
----------------

In a distant dystopian future, the world's elite have the vast majority of the world's wealth. As a means to establish some form of hierarchy within themselves, the world's wealthiest families created on under water gambling ring to compete amongst themselves. Seeing the most desirable things of the world could easily be bought, the founders sought to bet something money could not buy true beauty. Now many years later, the next generation has created a massive network, linking every country of the world into the practice. New members, old members the B.B.C or Body Bettors Club has created their own hierarchy for the worlds rich. Hotter the better, the men,women, and everything in-between run this club and everyone wants in.

------------
Setting
------------

A low lit, massive fully transparent underwater facility filled with every game and sport conceivable. Lounges and colorful bright lights are abundant, Flashing and strobing to the beat of high energy almost night club like music, it screams sex and life. Club members can be seen commuting back and forth through massive transparent underwater tunnels. The club is often visited by poor onlookers from nearby underwater metropolises, constantly looking from the outside in on the elite engaging in the sexist rituals they've ever witnessed..

-----------------------------------------------
Hierarchy and Universe Laws
-----------------------------------------------

Members of the B.B.C are separated into three distinct ranks based on a individual's win streak,attractiveness,and time inside the club.

Rat: the lowest demeanor, common, broke people completely looked down upon by all ranks, entirely unwelcomed in the BBC.

Rabble: The second lowest demeanor, usually includes people of new wealth, (I.e. lottery winners etc) or poor people that managed to blend in well enough to go unnoticed. Mainly preyed upon by Regents, most Rabble are very average or below average looking people either having all their original body parts or the leftovers from people of higher ranking. Most Rabble can be seen either masturbating or having sex in many areas. At a certain win streak Rabble rank up after gaining the knowledge to do mental swaps. Rabble can ONLY place body part bets.

Regents: The most populous rank, usually includes fairly attractive people with decent win streaks. Most Regents compete amungst themselves, taking heavy pride in their winnings. The higher the win streak the less clothing they tend to wear. Regents can be seen wearing skimpy clothing and gather amongst themselves. At a certain win streak a Regent can rank up after gaining the knowledge to swap or take any aspect of someone else. Regents can place body part bets AND mental swaps.

Royals: The least populous rank, includes long time club members with long and very impressive win streaks. Royals can be easily noticed by there highly attractive bodies which they show off 24/7 when they walk around completely naked. Usually fairly snobby they look down upon any who can match their level of attractiveness. After a certain point long time some Royals grow bored and swap their entire body with a Rabble individual and start over. Some Royals even have multiple bodies! Royals have access to swap OR take any aspect of someone else after winning a bet.

The B.B.C is only open to the rich by invitations from existing club members, although on a very rare occasion a stray poverty ridden individual sneaks in and goes unnoticed.

If a person losses their entire body they are reduced to a soul to inhabit unoccupied bodies.



---------
Rules
---------

Only human to human swaps.

Longer the chapter the more GPs awarded.

New characters are welcome.

Swaps can occur in any you see fit, but try keep the method consistent throughout each story path.

Skin color automatically adjusts per swap.

The hotter the chapter the more gift points awarded.

E-mail me if you have any further questions.

Have fun!

-----------------
Characters
-----------------

Stephanie: Rank: Rabble, 18, female straight, white, 5'6 with short black hair and B-Cup breasts. She was in her last year of high school when she discover a mysterious letter inviting her to the B.B.C. Although her family themselves are not overly wealthy, she is friends with a multitude of wealthy students in her school. Smart but somewhat oblivious, she is a very polite girl who grew in a very conservative household, having never been with a boy nor has ever seen a male naked, she is completely ignorant to the male anatomy, only knowing what her friends describe from their adventures.

John: Rank: Rabble, 19, male, straight, white, 5'10 with short dark brown hair and fairly athletic build. Oldest son of one of the richest families in London, he recently was allowed to join the club after over hearing a group of girls in his morning college classes talk about their experience. Cocky, brash, and arrogant he looks at the B.B.C as just another challenge he can conquer. Has a crush on Veronica.

Veronica: Rank Regent, 22, female, bisexual, mixed asian, 5'6 with long black hair and D-Cup breasts. One of the hottest girls on John's college campus, she is a fairly seasoned veteran of the B.B.C. Not an overly curvy girl, she makes up for her short comings with her newly won perfectly round breasts, which she's be flaunting for weeks now. Feisty and competitive, she rarely loses a bet and cherishes her original God givin glories. Has a fierce rivalry with Leah.

Leah: Rank: Regent, 25, female, bisexual, white, 5'5 with short blond hair and C-Cup breasts. Previously the fairly nerdy and eccentric best friend of John, Liam, he has been completely absorbed into the B.B.C. Having never seen him in weeks, John has no clue of how far Liam has gone. Winning bet after bet, Leah has one of the largest winning streaks amoungest Regents. After trading her previous personality and memories with Casey, Leah is now a hot spunky young woman with no memories of her previous life.

Zhu: Rank: Regent, 20, male, straight, asian, 5'9, with a somewhat below average build. Having kept his involvement in the B.B C a secret from his friends, Zhu has one of the worst losing streaks amoungest Regents, having only gained his rank from time alone. Winning and losing, Zhu looks mostly the same when John reconnects with him in the club. Horrible at almost everything, it doesn't damper on his mood at all. Easygoing and fun loving, even if he knows he isn't going to win that doesn't stop him from challenging any hot female Royal he can find, just for a shot at getting his hands on some breasts.

Casey: Rank: Regent, 34, female, gay, white, 5'5, with perky E-Cup breasts. A very curvy woman, she is one of the oldest Regents. Previously having a long winning streak as a Rabble member, she had been on a downhill spiral for years. Losing bet after bet she somehow still managed to maintain her very attractive figure and innocent smile. After losing a recent bet with Leah, Casey has the mind and memories of John's best friend Liam. Loud and perverted she acts nothing like the hot trophy wife she appears as.

Reginald: Rank: Royal, 25, male, straight, Black, with a Olympic God like figure. Pompous and cocky he sports the longest winning streak in the club. A borderline mystery, he is always seen walking around naked while being followed by a large crowd of women.

Sabrina: Rank: Royal, 20, female, straight, white, with DD-Cup breasts. Rarely seen not having sex with someone, she has no qualms whatsoever about showing off her body to any onlookers. Open and very outspoken, she struts her tattooed covered body around completely naked. She is seen as the poster child for anyone seeking the perfect female body in the club.
